Hello,

I downloaded the Heritrix 3.1.1. source (from http://builds.archive=
.org:8080/maven2/org/archive/heritrix/heritrix/3.1.1/), then I opened it wi=
th NetBeans and tried to compile the project. NetBeans built up the Maven l=
ocal repository and started to run the unit tests. But some tests failed, s=
o the whole building process stopped before JAR packaging.

Can anybody hel=
p me?

Thanks in advance,
Zsolt
